name: Johnny Earth
description:
A unique 2D platformer shooter  with   interesting mechanics. 

Shoot directly below you to gain more height while jumping or to retain your height while in the air. 

Aim directly at an enemy and the crosshair will turn red. Your projectiles will do double-damage.

Right-click to Melee with your baseball bat. This not only damages enemies but can also deflect smaller projectiles!

- Movement -

W,A,S,D - To jump, move left, crouch, and move right

Space - An alternate jump button

Shift - Sprint

- Mouse -

Move Mouse - Aim (Aim directly at enemies for double damage)

Left Click - Shoot

Right Click - Melee/Deflect projectiles
